attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Tbh I have one thing to say to this app....This app is trash😍

attributes.title: how did they even do this????
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app as a joke a few weeks ago.. little did i know what that would bring...

it started off simple, minor inconveniences, my microwave not making popcorn fully, the dog i was taking care of wining more, my water machine broke, infinitesimal things like that... then... it started getting worse... people started treating me... different... i would go to the store and the cashier would always have a passive-aggressive attitude to my, what i like to think, more optimistic attitude. after two weeks or so... is was so, so much worse. i sit heere in my room writing this as a last resort, because even after i deleted the app, it fallowed me. i started to see this... thing. i saw is more and more as the days got darker, almost slower it seemed. until, yesterday. i saw it fully. before yesterday i only ever really saw it out of the corner of my eye, but yesterday.. oh god yesterday. with its yellow-brown tinted, infinitely blood covered teeth, and it’s bright eyes that stood out from the rest of its dark body, almost like it was covered in black paint that was forbidden from touching its eyes or mouth... it nearly killed me. i’m hiding now, but for all i know, it knows where i am no matter what. that seems to be what happens in horror movies like this. i can hope for the best but i will never, and i mean never mentally recover.

🧚💫 also bunker boy over heere needs to be out of office 💫🧚

attributes.title: Worst
attributes.review: Honestly, idk what to even say this apps functionality is so low. I expected better.

attributes.title: This App told me to put on more clothes
attributes.review: If statues didn’t want to be vandalized maybe they shouldn’t have dressed so confederately. 🤔 Now who’s fault is that. This app lets statues run about the country wearing whatever they want all nilly silly. Where is the quality control? I miss the old days when everyone lived in Mesopotamia and statues didn’t exist or at least people wouldn’t talk about them. Ever HEARD of seen not heard. It seems there aren’t any standards anymore. Anywhoo. Save yourself the effort and download TikTok instead.

attributes.title: so unsafictory
attributes.review: all the others reviews on the app were right, it didn’t bring any happiness to me like i though it would. oops

attributes.title: ✨bad✨
attributes.review: this just ain’t okay. as soon as i opened the app the vibes just weren’t it. then an orange 🍊 appeared in my room which was terrifying and it wouldn’t leave. so i fed it to the possum in my backyard yum 😋. then in my 2 year old sons room on the ceiling was written Braden 🇺🇸🎣💪🏼 is typing... 😹scary

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: if i could rate it 0 starts i would. really ghetto, really unprofessional and has A LOT bugs 😣. would i recommend? ABSOLUTELY NOT.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS AWFUL DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app took me 69 days and 420 hours to download. Once it did, the login process took LONGER!! This is the most atrocious thing I have ever downloaded. If you download this then expect to be 20 years older by the time it’s done. I showed my cat that it was talking so long and she VOMITED🤮🤮ON MY BED🛏🛏🛏🛏 When i cleaned it up, she didn’t stop. BEWARE THIS APP CAUSES FELINE VOMITING
